ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Race of study subject
ValueRange: American Indian/Alaska Native; Asian; Hawaiian or Pacific Islander; Black or African American; White; More than one race; Unknown or not reported; Other Non-White; Other

ElementDescription: Ethnicity of participant
ValueRange: Hispanic or Latino; Not Hispanic or Latino; Unknown

ElementDescription: Highest degree status
Notes: 1=No high school diploma or equivalent; 2=High school diploma or equivalent; 3=Some college, but no degree; 4=Associate degree; 5=Bachelor degree; 6=Master degree; 7=Doctoral degree or equivalent; 8=Other; 9=Some graduate work

ElementDescription: Discipline/Profession
Notes: 1= Addictions Counseling; 2=Social Work/Human Services; 3=Nurse Practitioner; 4=Other Counseling; 5=Physician Assistant; 6=Administration; 7=Education; 8=Medicine: Primary Care; 9=None, unemployed; 10= Vocational Rehabilitation; 11=Medicine: Psychiatry; 12=None, student; 13=Criminal Justice; 14=Medicine: Other; 15=Other; 16=Psychology17=Nurse

ElementDescription: Profession specify
Certification Status in Addictions Field
Notes: 1=Not certified or licensed in addiction; 2=Currently certified or licensed; 3=Previously certified or licensed, not now; 4=Intern

ElementDescription: How many years of experience do you have in drug abuse counseling
Notes: 1=0-6 months; 2= 6-11 months; 3=1 to 3 years; 4= 3 to 5 year; 5=over 5 years

ElementDescription: How long have you been in your present job
Notes: 1=0-6 months; 2= 6-11 months; 3=1 to 3 years; 4= 3 to 5 year; 5=over 5 years
